alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 3:42AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet, Lake County Below 11000 Feet and Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
